conversation.Name: Alice
conversation.Text: Excuse me, sir. Do you have any information about the delay of the train?

conversation.Name: Bob
conversation.Text: I'm really sorry for the inconvenience, ladies. There was an unexpected signal failure up ahead.

conversation.Name: Alice
conversation.Text: Oh, that's understandable. Thank you for letting us know.

conversation.Name: Caroline
conversation.Text: How long do you think the delay will be?

conversation.Name: Bob
conversation.Text: We're working on fixing the issue as quickly as possible. I'll make an announcement as soon as I have more information.
